pages.title: ToDo Txt Web UI
pages.description: Inspired by the http://www.todotxt.com project this web app provides a simple web-based user interface for interacting with one's todo.txt file.

pages.title: Shortlist It
pages.description: A web application to help you decide which choices you should make based on your own priorities

pages.title: Elite:Dangerous Controls
pages.description: A web application that parses your Elite:Dangerous Control Bindings to display them in an easy to read manner

pages.title: LoD Quadsphere
pages.description: A QuadSphere (six-sided sphere) implementation with Level of Detail (LoD) support (can increase or decrease mesh density on demand)

pages.title: Traffic Sim
pages.description: A road construction traffic app that uses THREE.js to simulate traffic conditions based on road design

pages.title: Spaceship Game
pages.description: side-scrolling space combat game written using the PhaserJs framework

pages.title: War Sim Game
pages.description: A turn-based game based off the Games Workshop Hobbit series

pages.title: Automated Functional Testing (AFT)
pages.description: a NodeJs test framework written in Typescript for performing Functional / End-2-End testing of UI and API components
